replies.body: xerath laughs at your post with his ludicrous range.
Annie laughs at your comment with her aoe unmissable half-healthing stun which also happens to summon a massive bear that deals DoT AOE damage, body blocks, tanks turrets and autos like a mofo

Tibbers is disgusting, like when and if i play annie, i want to puke every time i pull off her combo.

That and the fact that her combo is legit cast your abilities in any order and get a free stun and tons of damage.

Tons of damage.
Xerath calls you when the timezone is convenient to tell you that your massive bear needs to pass an enormous body of land to get anywhere near his sparky bot bot.
